thai_script: ปลาแรดทอดกระเทียม

thai_script: ต้มยำปลาแรด
description: Thailand’s world-famous hot and sour soup, made with shrimp or other proteins, lemongrass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves, and chilies. It is spicy, tangy, and fragrant.

thai_script: แกงป่าปลาแรด

thai_script: ต้มยำปลาคัง
description: Thailand’s world-famous hot and sour soup, made with shrimp or other proteins, lemongrass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves, and chilies. It is spicy, tangy, and fragrant.

description: Catfish stir-fried with garlic, chili, and salt for a spicy, savory flavor with a crispy texture.

thai_script: ปลาคังทอดกระเทียม

thai_script: ผัดฉ่า/ฉู่ฉี่ปลาคัง
description: A rich Thai curry dish made with red curry paste, coconut milk, and fish or seafood. It is thick, aromatic, and slightly sweet with a spicy kick.

thai_script: แกงป่าปลาคัง
description: A traditional Thai curry without coconut milk, made with a variety of wild herbs, vegetables, and meat. It is intensely spicy, aromatic, and watery in texture, reflecting its forest origins.

thai_script: เขียวหวาน

thai_script: ต้มยำทะเลใส,ข้น
description: Thailand’s world-famous hot and sour soup, made with shrimp or other proteins, lemongrass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves, and chilies. It is spicy, tangy, and fragrant.

thai_script: ยำหมูหมัก

thai_script: ลาบหมูคั่ว
description: Minced meat salad+fish sauce+garlic

thai_script: หมูมะนาว

thai_script: ไข่เจียวใบยอ

thai_script: แกงส้มไข่ทอดใบยอกุ้ง

thai_script: เต้าหู้ไข่ผัดผงกะหรี่

thai_script: น้ำพริกกุ้งสด

thai_script: หมูกรอบคั่วพริกเกลือ

thai_script: หมูกรอบผัดผงกะหรี่
description: A Thai stir-fried curry dish with curry powder, egg, onion, celery, and meat or seafood, most famously crab. It is rich, savory, and mildly spicy.

thai_name: Pad Phet Moo Pa Nor Mai Dong

thai_script: กระเพราหมูป่า
english_name: Stir-fried Wild Boar with Holy Basil
description: A spicy stir-fry of wild boar meat with holy basil, chili, and garlic, known for its bold flavors.

thai_script: แกงป่าหมูป่า
description: A traditional Thai curry without coconut milk, made with a variety of wild herbs, vegetables, and meat. It is intensely spicy, aromatic, and watery in texture, reflecting its forest origins.

thai_script: ฉู่ฉี่หมูป่า
description: A rich Thai curry dish made with red curry paste, coconut milk, and fish or seafood. It is thick, aromatic, and slightly sweet with a spicy kick.

thai_script: ไข่เจียวหมูสับ
description: A fluffy Thai omelet made with eggs, fish sauce, and oil, fried until golden and crispy on the edges. Often served over rice.

thai_script: ไข่เจียวแหนม
description: A fluffy Thai omelet made with eggs, fish sauce, and oil, fried until golden and crispy on the edges. Often served over rice.

thai_script: ไข่เจียวกุ้ง
description: A fluffy Thai omelet made with eggs, fish sauce, and oil, fried until golden and crispy on the edges. Often served over rice.

thai_script: ข้าวจาน
description: A general serving of rice presented on a plate, often accompanied by various side dishes or curries.

thai_script: หม้อเล็ก
description: A small portion of Thai-style hotpot, suitable for one or two people, served with soup and sides.

thai_script: หม้อกลาง
description: A medium-sized Thai hotpot portion, served with broth, meat, or seafood and vegetables.

thai_script: หม้อใหญ่
description: A large serving of Thai-style hotpot, typically filled with broth, meat, seafood, and vegetables for sharing.

thai_script: ข้าวผัดกุ้งจานใหญ่
description: A classic Thai fried rice dish stir-fried with garlic, soy sauce, egg, and a choice of meat or seafood. Often served with cucumber slices and lime on the side.

thai_name: Pla Rad/Pla Tubtim Tod Kratiem Prik Thai Dam

description: Gourami or tilapia deep-fried and seasoned with garlic and black pepper for a fragrant, crispy dish.

thai_name: Pla Rad/Pla Tubtim Tod Yum Mamuang

description: Crispy fried fish topped with a tangy and spicy Thai green mango salad.

thai_script: ปลาแรด, ปลาทับทิม สามรส

thai_script: ปลาแรด, ปลาทับทิม ราดพริก

thai_name: Pla Rad/Pla Tubtim Tod Samun Phrai

thai_name: Pla Rad/Pla Tubtim Tod Pad Prik Thai Dam

description: Crispy gourami or tilapia stir-fried with black pepper and aromatics for a bold, savory flavor.

thai_script: ปลาแรด, ปลาทับทิม น้ำตก

thai_script: ปลาแรด, ปลาทับทิม นึ่งมะนาว

description: Steamed fish served in a tangy and spicy lime, chili, and garlic sauce, a refreshing Thai classic.

thai_script: ยำหมูย่าง
description: A zesty Thai salad made with slices of grilled pork mixed with lime juice, chili, fish sauce, and fresh herbs.

thai_script: ยำไก่ย่าง

thai_script: หมูย่างจิ้มแจ่ว

thai_script: ยำวุ้นเส้น

thai_script: ปีกไก่ทอดจิ้มแจ่ว

description: Deep-fried chicken wings served with jaew, a smoky and spicy dipping sauce from Northeastern Thailand.

thai_script: เฟรนฟราย

thai_script: นักเก็ต

thai_script: กุ้งโรล

thai_script: ไก่ครีมมะนาว

thai_script: ผัดเห็ดนํ้ามันหอย

thai_script: ซุปกระดูกหมู

description: A classic Thai dish of chicken or pork stir-fried with holy basil, chili, and garlic, served over rice.

thai_script: ก๋วยเตี๋ยวคั่วไก่
description: Flat rice noodles stir-fried with chicken, garlic, and soy sauce for a smoky flavor. Often served with a runny fried egg on top.

thai_script: ข้าวผัดไก่,หมู

thai_script: ข้าวผัดปู
description: A classic Thai fried rice dish stir-fried with garlic, soy sauce, egg, and a choice of meat or seafood. Often served with cucumber slices and lime on the side.

description: A classic Thai fried rice dish stir-fried with garlic, soy sauce, egg, and a choice of meat or seafood. Often served with cucumber slices and lime on the side.

thai_script: ข้าวไข่เจียวหมูสับ
description: A fluffy Thai omelet made with eggs, fish sauce, and oil, fried until golden and crispy on the edges. Often served over rice.

thai_script: ไข่ดาว

thai_script: ข้าวขาหมูไก่

thai_script: กุ้งกระเบื้องโรยงา

thai_script: ปลากดลวกจิ้ม
description: Catfish lightly boiled and served with a spicy dipping sauce, highlighting the fish’s natural flavor.

thai_script: กุ้งแช่น้ำปลา

thai_script: ปลาหมึกผัดพริกป่น
description: Tender squid stir-fried with ground dried chili, garlic, and Thai seasonings for a spicy and aromatic dish.

thai_script: ทอดมันกุ้ง
description: A popular Thai dish made from fish paste mixed with red curry paste, long beans, and kaffir lime leaves, then deep-fried until golden. Served with cucumber relish.

thai_name: Pla Kapong Pad Prik Thai Dam
thai_script: ปลากระพงผัดพริกไทยดำ
english_name: Stir-fried Sea Bass with Black Pepper
description: Sea bass fillets stir-fried with black pepper, garlic, and vegetables, creating a bold and aromatic dish.

thai_script: กะเพราปลาทอด

description: Crispy fried fish stir-fried with holy basil, garlic, and chili for a fragrant and spicy dish.

description: Crispy fried fish stir-fried with curry paste, chili, and herbs for a bold and spicy flavor.

thai_script: คอยหมูย่าง จิ้มแจ่ว
english_name: Grilled Pork with Spicy Dipping Sauce
description: Slices of marinated pork, grilled until tender and smoky, served with a northeastern Thai dipping sauce (nam jim jaew) made of roasted rice powder, chili, and lime.

thai_script: กุ้งอบวุ้นเส้นหม้อ
description: A larger clay pot version of baked shrimp with glass noodles, cooked with soy sauce, pepper, and fresh herbs.

thai_script: กุ้งอบวุ้นเส้น
description: Shrimp baked with glass noodles, soy sauce, ginger, and herbs in a clay pot, giving it a fragrant and savory flavor.

thai_script: ออส่วน
description: A crispy and chewy omelet made with oysters and starch batter, often served sizzling with bean sprouts.

thai_script: สลัดกุ้งทอด

thai_script: กุ้งซอสครีมมะนาว

thai_script: สลัดปูนิ่ม

description: Crispy soft-shell crab stir-fried in a rich and creamy salted egg yolk sauce, giving it a savory and slightly sweet flavor.

thai_script: ข่เจียว

description: Whole sea bass steamed and served either with a savory soy sauce base or a tangy lime, garlic, and chili dressing.

thai_name: Pla Kapong Tod Pad Prik Glua
thai_script: ปลากระพงทอดผัดพริกเกลือ

description: Crispy fried sea bass stir-fried with salt, garlic, and fresh chilies for a spicy and aromatic flavor.

thai_script: ซี่โครงหมูทอดกระเทียม

thai_script: แซ่บกุ้ง
description: A fiery and tangy Thai salad made with shrimp, fresh herbs, chili, and lime juice for a bold flavor.

thai_script: ปูม้าผัดกระเทียม

thai_name: Pad Kra Pao Khai Yiew Ma
thai_script: ไข่เยี่ยวม้ากะเพรากรอบ
english_name: Stir Fried Minced Pork with Century Eggs
description: Stir-Fried Minced Pork with Century Eggs is a spicy Thai dish made with minced pork, garlic, chilies, and holy basil, then topped with wedges of creamy, pungent century eggs. The rich eggs balance the heat and savory pork, creating a bold mix of textures and flavors.

thai_script: ห่อหมกทะเล
description: A Northern and Northeastern Thai dish similar to 'aeb,' made of minced fish, chicken, or mushrooms mixed with curry paste, wrapped in banana leaves, and steamed.

thai_script: ปูผัดผงกะหรี่
description: A Thai stir-fried curry dish with curry powder, egg, onion, celery, and meat or seafood, most famously crab. It is rich, savory, and mildly spicy.

thai_script: ปูผัดพริกไทยดำ
description: Crab stir-fried with black pepper, garlic, and onions for a bold and peppery flavor.

thai_script: เต้าหู้ทรงเครื่อง
description: Soft tofu topped with minced pork, mushrooms, and vegetables, simmered in a flavorful sauce.

thai_script: ลาบปลาทูทอด
description: Minced meat salad+fish sauce+garlic

thai_script: ปลาดุกฟูผัดขี้เมา

thai_script: กะเพราหมูสับ/ไก่สับ
english_name: Stir-fried Minced Pork or Chicken with Holy Basil
description: A classic Thai street food made with minced pork or chicken stir-fried with holy basil, chili, and garlic.

thai_script: กะหล่ำปลีผัดน้ำปลา
description: A simple yet flavorful stir-fry of cabbage with garlic and fish sauce, often served as a side dish.

thai_script: ปลากะพงทอดสามรส
english_name: Deep-fried Sea Bass with Three-flavor Sauce
description: Crispy fried sea bass topped with a sweet, sour, and spicy sauce, creating a balanced and flavorful Thai classic.

thai_script: ปลาทับทิมนึ่งมะนาว/นึ่งซีอิ๊ว
english_name: Steamed Ruby Fish with Lime or Soy Sauce
description: Ruby fish (tilapia) steamed and served with either a tangy lime, garlic, and chili dressing or a savory soy sauce base.

thai_script: ยำเห็ดเข็มทอง
description: A light and tangy salad made with enoki mushrooms tossed in lime juice, chili, fish sauce, and fresh herbs.

thai_script: ยำผักบุ้งกรอบ
description: Deep-fried morning glory tossed with chili, lime, fish sauce, and herbs for a crunchy and tangy salad.

thai_name: Yam Hed Khem Thong Thot Krop
thai_script: ยำเห็ดเข็มทองทอดกรอบ
description: Deep-fried enoki mushrooms mixed with chili, lime juice, and herbs for a crunchy and zesty Thai-style salad.

thai_script: ปลากระพงลุยสวน
english_name: Sea Bass with Spicy Garden-style Dressing
description: Deep-fried sea bass topped with a zesty mix of fresh herbs, garlic, lime, and chilies, known as 'garden style' dressing.

thai_script: กระเพาะปลาน้ำแดง
description: A savory soup made with fish maw stewed in a thick red-brown sauce with mushrooms and seasonings.

thai_script: กระเพาะปลาผัดแห้ง
description: Fish maw stir-fried without broth, cooked with vegetables, soy sauce, and garlic for a savory and chewy texture.

thai_script: กระเพาะปลาผัดกุ้ง
description: Fish maw stir-fried with shrimp, vegetables, and light seasonings for a chewy and savory dish.

thai_script: ฉู่ฉี่ปลาคังคัง
description: A rich Thai curry dish made with red curry paste, coconut milk, and fish or seafood. It is thick, aromatic, and slightly sweet with a spicy kick.

thai_script: ปีกไก่ทอดเกลือ
description: Simple and crispy deep-fried chicken wings lightly seasoned with salt for a savory snack or side dish.

thai_script: ปีกไก่คั่วพริกเกลือ
english_name: Fried Chicken Wings with Chili and Salt
description: Crispy chicken wings stir-fried with garlic, chili, and salt for a spicy and aromatic flavor.

thai_script: ปูผัดพริกเกลือ
english_name: Stir-fried Crab with Chili and Salt
description: Fresh crab stir-fried with garlic, chili, and salt, giving it a spicy, savory, and fragrant taste.

thai_script: เยื่อไผ่ตุ๋นน้ำแดง
description: A nourishing Chinese-influenced soup made with bamboo pith stewed in a savory red broth with vegetables and seasonings.

thai_script: ยอดข้าวโพดผัดกุ้ง
description: A light and savory stir-fry of tender baby corn and shrimp, cooked with garlic and oyster sauce.

thai_script: ผัดผักรวมมิตร
description: A healthy stir-fry of assorted seasonal vegetables cooked with garlic and oyster sauce.

thai_script: คะน้าน้ำมันหอย
english_name: Stir-fried Chinese Kale with Oyster Sauce
description: Fresh Chinese kale stir-fried with oyster sauce and garlic, a simple and savory Thai side dish.

thai_script: คะน้าปลาเค็ม
description: Chinese kale stir-fried with pieces of salted fish, creating a salty, aromatic flavor popular in Thai home cooking.

thai_script: บะหมือบกุ้ง
description: A noodle dish featuring egg noodles served with shrimp, often garnished with vegetables and light seasoning.

thai_script: ไก่ผัดเม็ดมะม่วง
description: A savory stir-fry of chicken, cashew nuts, and vegetables in a sweet and slightly spicy sauce.

thai_script: กุ้งผัดเม็ดมะม่วง
description: A savory stir-fry of shrimp with crunchy cashew nuts, onions, and dried chili in a sweet-salty sauce.

thai_script: ยำรวมมิตรทะเล
description: A zesty salad of assorted seafood such as shrimp, squid, and mussels combined with lime, chili, and fresh herbs.

thai_script: ยำสามกรอบ
description: A Thai salad made with three crispy ingredients, often pork rind, cashews, and fried shrimp, tossed with lime juice, chili, and fish sauce. It has a crunchy texture and a bold, tangy flavor.

thai_script: ปลาหมึกผัดไข่เค็ม
description: Squid stir-fried with salted egg yolk, chili, and curry leaves, creating a rich, creamy, and savory flavor.

thai_script: ปลาหิมะนึ่งซีอิ๊ว
english_name: Steamed Snow Fish with Soy Sauce
description: Snow fish delicately steamed and served with a savory soy sauce dressing, highlighting its soft and buttery texture.

thai_name: Phak Kat Khao Nam Man Hoi
thai_script: ผักกาดขาวน้ำมันหอย
english_name: Stir-fried Napa Cabbage with Oyster Sauce
description: Tender napa cabbage stir-fried with garlic and oyster sauce for a simple yet flavorful side dish.

thai_script: เห็ดเป๋าฮื้อเจี้ยนคะน้า
description: Tender abalone mushrooms simmered with crisp kale in a flavorful sauce, balancing earthy and slightly bitter notes.

thai_script: เห็ดเป๋าฮื้อผัดกุ้ง
description: A light and savory stir-fry of abalone mushrooms and shrimp, cooked with garlic and oyster sauce for a delicate flavor.

thai_script: ไข่เจียวปู
description: A fluffy Thai omelet made with eggs, fish sauce, and oil, fried until golden and crispy on the edges. Often served over rice.

thai_script: ไข่เจียวหอยนางรม
description: A fluffy Thai omelet made with eggs, fish sauce, and oil, fried until golden and crispy on the edges. Often served over rice.

thai_script: ผักบุ้งไฟแดง
description: Morning-glory (a.k.a. water spinach ) stir fried with yellow bean sauce , garlic, and chili peppers. It is a very popular vegetable dish in Thailand.

thai_script: ยำวุ้นเส้นทะเล
description: A refreshing salad of glass noodles mixed with shrimp, squid, and herbs, tossed in a spicy lime dressing.

thai_script: ผัดผัก 4 สหาย
description: A colorful stir-fry featuring four types of vegetables, often mushrooms, baby corn, carrots, and snow peas.
